Emiya gains a set of new abilities. \nSword Barrage - Retreat: Emiya immediately retreats backward and strikes area in a line with several swords, each dealing damage.\nSword Barrage - Confine: Emiya manipulates several swords to drop in a small area, trapping, ministunning, reducing their armor, and dealing damage to them.\nProjection: Gae Bolg: Emiya leaps to the sky and hurl a projected version of Cu Chulainn's Gae Bolg, dealing damage in an area and knocking them upwards.\nSword Barrage - Bombard: Emiya manipulates numerous weapons on his will and strikes random areas inside Unlimited Blade Works with them, each dealing area damage while ministunning the enemies inside.\nNine Lives Blade Works: Emiya projects Heracles's weapon and mimics his ultimate technique, dashing to targeted area and striking all enemies in small radius 9 times, damaging and stunning them repetitively. The last strike has bigger radius, deals more damage and briefly knocks enemies back.\n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Improve Projection" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_Lore" "An aria using a poem of the caster's life, used to activate high-thaumaturgy." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_Note1" "On activation of completed Unlimited Blade Works, all nearby units are paused and revoked as they are transferred into Emiya's Reality Marble." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_Note2" "In case UBW is overlapping with another Reality Marble, the battlefield takes place in the first Marble cast. When that Marble is broken, both Marbles cease to sustain." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_form_delay" "UBW DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_chrono_range" "CHRONO RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_radius" "RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_ubw_duration" "UBW DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_upgrade" "Unlimited Blade Works (Ready)" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_upgrade_Description" "Chant the last line of the Unlimited Blade Works. Bring all nearby heroes and units into his inner world. Emiya gains a set of new abilities while existing abilities are enhanced.\nUnlimited Blade Works - Auto Blade: Swords passively fly toward and attacks enemies, dealing physical damage based on Emiya's INT.\nSword Barrage - Retreat: Emiya immediately retreats backward and strikes area in a line with several swords, each dealing damage. The enemies that get hit by swords will be rooted.\nSword Barrage - Confine: Emiya manipulates several swords to drop in a small area, trapping, ministunning, reducing their armor and MR, and dealing damage to them.\nProjection: Gae Bolg: Emiya leaps to the sky and hurl a projected version of Cu Chulainn's Gae Bolg, dealing damage in an area and knocking them upwards.\nSword Barrage - Bombard: Emiya manipulates numerous weapons on his will and strikes random areas inside Unlimited Blade Works with them, each dealing area damage while ministunning the enemies inside.\nNine Lives Blade Works: Emiya projects Heracles's weapon and mimics his ultimate technique, dashing to targeted area and striking all enemies in small radius 9 times, damaging and stunning them repetitively. The last strike has bigger radius, deals more damage and briefly knocks enemies back." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_upgrade_Lore" "An aria using a poem of the caster's life, used to activate high-thaumaturgy." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_upgrade_Note1" "On activation of completed Unlimited Blade Works, all nearby units are paused and revoked as they are transferred into Emiya's Reality Marble." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_archer_unlimited_bladeworks_upgrade_Note2" "In case UBW is overlapping with another Reality Marble, the battlefield takes place in the first Marble cast. When that Marble is broken, both Marbles cease to sustain." Hassan's attacks always apply Dirk Poison and Weakening Venom when he has mana and daggers available in stock. \nACTIVE: Consume 1 Dirks's stack to throws poisoned daggers at target enemy, dealing damage, applying Dirk Poison and Weakening Venom for a short duration. \nDirk Poison: Slow and deals magic damage over time to target. \nWeakening Venom: Reduced armor, movespeed and attack damage of target." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hassan_dirk_upgrade_Lore" "The hunter's call begins with flurry of daggers, coated in poison." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_hassan_dirk_upgrade_Note0" "Poison can be stacked." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gilgamesh_enuma_elish" "Enuma Elish" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gilgamesh_enuma_elish_Description" "CHANNEL: Gilgamesh channels energy. When the channeling is interrupted or success, Gilgamesh will releases wave of destruction in cone shape, inflicts heavy damage to all enemies. \n As the channeling longer, Enuma Elish gains more damage and end width. \n If the channeling is interrupted below the minimum channel time, it will consider as fail casting, Gilgamesh lose some mana and the ability will be cooldowned. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Sword of Creation." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gilgamesh_enuma_elish_Lore" "The force of creation distorts space into a crack of abyss, where only nothingness exists." Lancelot parry some damage everytime he is attacked." Target also takes bonus damage while moving. \nSmother: Applied Smother Curse to all enemies inside target area for durations. \nSmother Curse: Target takes damage over time. If target cast an ability, all nearby enemies takes bonus damage while the target will be stunned for a short duration. \nHysteria: Applied Hysteria to target for durations. \nHysteria: Increase target's attack speed. At the end of duration, target will be stunned and take pure damage based on target's missing health \nGrief: Applied Grief Curse to target for durations. \nGrief Curse: At the end of duration, target takes pure damage and stun while all nearby enemies take magic damage based on target's missing health. \nMisery: Applied Misery Curse to all enemies inside target area for durations. \nMisery Curse: When target takes damage, target will be ministunned." Proving bird view vision and reveal all invisible while applying Heat to all enemies. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Nightless Charisma. \nBlade of the Devoted (Light): Gawain's next attack stuns the target for a duration. \nExcalibur Galatine (Light): Gawain unleashes the sun's ray instead of energy orb. \n HEAT DAMAGE PER SEC: (Sun of Galatine's Lvl + Excalibur Galatine's Lvl) x %heat_lvl%" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_duration" "DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_bonus_atk" "BONUS ATTACK:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_bonus_atk_range" "BONUS ATTACK RANGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_burn_dps" "BURN DAMAGE PER SEC:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_burn_stack_dps" "BONUS BURN DAMAGE PER STACK:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_burn_duration" "BURN/SLOW DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_slow" "%SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_sun_duration" "SUN DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_sun_radius" "SUN VISION RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_sun_reveal" "SUN TRUE SIGHT RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_2_heat_radius" "HEAT RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3" "Light of Galatine" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_Description" "Gawain gains Light of Galatine for durations. \nLight of Galatine: Increase Gawain's attack, attack speed and attack range. Gawain's normal attack applied Slow and Burn's stack to target. \nBurn: Deal damage based on its stacks. \n Gawain creates an Aritificial Sun above his head for durations. Proving bird view vision and reveal all invisible while applying Heat to all enemies. \nBlade of the Devoted (Light): Gawain's next attack stuns the target for a duration. \nExcalibur Galatine (Light): Gawain unleashes the sun's ray instead of energy orb. \n HEAT DAMAGE PER SEC: (Sun of Galatine's Lvl + Excalibur Galatine's Lvl) x %heat_lvl%" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_duration" "DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_bonus_atk" "BONUS ATTACK:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_bonus_aspd" "%BONUS ATTACK SPEED:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_bonus_atk_range" "BONUS ATTACK RANGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_burn_dps" "BURN DAMAGE PER SEC:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_burn_stack_dps" "BONUS BURN DAMAGE PER STACK:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_burn_duration" "BURN/SLOW DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_slow" "%SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_sun_duration" "SUN DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_sun_radius" "SUN VISION RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_sun_reveal" "SUN TRUE SIGHT RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_light_of_galatine_upgrade_3_heat_radius" "HEAT RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine" "Sun of Galatine" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_Description" "CHANNEL: Gawain creates an Artificial Sun. Gawain disjoints all targetted projectile while applying Sun of Galatine to all enemies around himself. \n Interrupt or success, creating a massive explosion, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and stuns them based on how long Gawain channeled. \nSun of Galatine: Decrease target's movespeed and dealing damage over time. \n Artificial Sun last long til the end of channeling. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Belt of Bertilak and Knight of The Sun. " "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_channel_dps" "BURN DAMAGE PER SEC:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_burst_damage" "EXPLOSION DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_radius" "RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_duration" "MAXIMUM CHANNEL TIME:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_stun" "MAXIMUM STUN DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_slow" "%SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_upgrade_1" "Sun of Galatine" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_upgrade_1_Description" "CHANNEL: Gawain creates an Artificial Sun. Gawain gains Belt of Bertilak, disjoints all targetted projectile while applying Sun of Galatine to all enemies around himself. \n Interrupt or success, creating a massive explosion, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and stuns them based on how long Gawain channeled. \nSun of Galatine: Decrease target's movespeed and dealing damage over time. \nBelt of Bertilak: Decrease incoming damage to Gawain. \n Artificial Sun last long til the end of channeling. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Knight of The Sun." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_Lore" "The sister sword of Excalibur contains psuedo-Sun within its hilt, purging the evil with solar flame." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_cast_delay" "CHARGE DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_damage" "DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_max_range" "MAXIMUM DISTANCE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_radius" "EXPLOSION RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_dot_damage" "BURN DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_duration" "BURN DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_upgrade_1" "Excalibur Galatine" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_upgrade_1_Description" "Gawain creates the Artificial Sun, charging Excalibur Galatine and gaining Belt of Bertilak for a short duration, then unleash an orb of energy. \n While the orb travels, it leaves behind a trail of fire, burning all enemies standing on it for durations. When the orb detonates, deals massive amount of magical damage. \n Belt of Bertilak: Decrease incoming damage to Gawain. \n Gawain can detonate ball at his will during its flight by activating this ability again. \n Gawain is stunned and revoked from Master until finishes charging. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Knight of The Sun." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_excalibur_galatine_upgrade_1_Lore" "The sister sword of Excalibur contains psuedo-Sun within its hilt, purging the evil with solar flame." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_divine_meltdown" "Divine Meltdown" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_divine_meltdown_Description" "Causes all Artifical Suns on the map to emit scorching heat for 5 seconds, inflicting pure damage to enemies within 1000 radius based on their current health. Damage starts at 8%% per 0.5 second and diminishes down to 3.5%% per 0.5 second over time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gawain_supernova" "Supernova" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_supernova_Description" "Combo Requirement : 30 all stats\nCombo Sequence : Q - R(on same target) in 3 seconds\nSaber enchants target with cosmic energy, granting magic immunity and causing nearby Artificial Suns to follow the target for the duration. At the end, all Artificial Suns attached to target create a gravitational collapse, inflicting destructive damage to enemies in large area and stunning them.\nEach subsequent Sun explosion after first one deals 33%% less damage." In addition, the defensive bonus is doubled." //"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gawain_attribute_blessing_of_fairy" "Blessing of Fairy" //"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_attribute_blessing_of_fairy_Description" "Saber restores 500 health upon taking fatal damage." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gawain_attribute_divine_meltdown" "Divine Meltdown" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_attribute_divine_meltdown_Description" "Enables Divine Meltdown.\nDivine Meltdown : Causes all Artifical Suns on the map to emit scorching heat for 5 seconds, inflicting pure damage to enemies within 800 radius based on their current health. Damage per second starts at 9%% and diminishes down to 5%% per second over time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gawain_attribute_sunlight" "Sunlight" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_attribute_sunlight_Description" "Enchances supportive nature of Saber, improving ability effects on ally.\nInvigorating Ray : Also grants 30%% bonus magic resistance and 20 armor.\nBlade of the Devoted : Also replenishes mana and reduces cooldown of all abilities by 15 seconds.\nExcalibur Galatine : 50%% additional heal is done over next 3 seconds\nSun's Embrace : Grants 30%% bonus magic resistance\n\nSaber may not obtain both Sunlight and Eclipse attribute." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_gawain_attribute_eclipse" "Eclipse" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_attribute_eclipse_Description" "Enchances offensive capability of Saber, improving ability effects on enemy.\nInvigorating Ray : Deals full damage\nBlade of the Devoted : For 3 seconds, Consecutive base attacks activate same effect with 50%% less damage.\nExcalibur Galatine : Deals up to 40%% more damage based on how close target is to the center of explosion\nSun's Embrace : Stuns for 1.5 seconds\n\nSaber may not obtain both Sunlight and Eclipse attribute." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_soulstream_ice_upgrade_1" "Soulstream (Ice)" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tamamo_soulstream_ice_upgrade_1_Description" "Tamamo gains Soulstream's stack and throws ice spirits to target location while consuming Curse Charm's stacks. \n Upon colliding with enemy, the spirit explodes, dealing damage, stealing enemy's mana based on Tamamo's INT and applying Frigid Heaven for a short duration. \nSoulstream: Increase Tamamo's movespeed and its mana cost. \nFrigid Heaven: Slows target. \n MANA STEAL: %base_mana_drain% + (%bonus_int_ratio% x INT)" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu" "Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tamamo_amaterasu_Description" "Tamamo creates a mythical zone around her. \n All allies gain Blessing of Amaterasu until they leave the zone. \nBlessing of Amaterasu: Increase targets's mana regen, movespeed and attackspeed while casting ability will restore their health and mana. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Territory Creation. \n Amaterasu zone will be vanished when Tamamo leave the zone." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_Lore" "The celestial mirror reveals itself in the sky, bestowing the primordial mana among the justs." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_cast_point" "CAST POINT:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_radius" "RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_mana_regen" "%BONUS MANA REGEN:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_movespeed_modifier" "%BONUS MOVE/ATTACK SPEED:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_heal_amount" "HEALTH RESTORE PER CAST:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_mana_amount" "MANA RESTORE PER CAST:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_duration" "DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade" "Eightfold Blessing of Amaterasu" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_Description" "Tamamo creates a mythical zone around her. \n All allies gain Amaterasu Heal, reduce remaining cooldown of all resettable abilities and gain Blessing of Amaterasu until they leave the zone while all enemies will be silenced for a short duration and applied with Amaterasu Slow until they leave the zone. \nBlessing of Amaterasu: Increase targets's mana regen, movespeed and attackspeed while casting ability will restore their health and mana. \nAmaterasu Heal: Heal target over time. \nAmaterasu Slow: Decrease target's movespeed and attackspeed. \n Amaterasu zone will be vanished when Tamamo leave the zone." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_Lore" "The celestial mirror reveals itself in the sky, bestowing the primordial mana among the justs." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_cast_point" "CAST POINT:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_radius" "RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_mana_regen" "%BONUS MANA REGEN:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_instant_heal" "%TOTAL HEAL:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_cooldown_reduction" "REDUCE REMAINING COOLDOWN:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_movespeed_modifier" "%BONUS MOVE/ATTACK SPEED:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_heal_amount" "HEALTH RESTORE PER CAST:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_mana_amount" "MANA RESTORE PER CAST:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_movespeed_modifier_enemy" "%SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_silence" "SILENCE DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu_upgrade_duration" "DURATION:" ////////////////////// Special Ability ////////////////////////////////// "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist" "Polygamist Castration Kick" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_Description" "Tamamo dashs towards the target enemy and kicks him or her 3 times. \n 1st Kick: Dealing magic damage and ministunning the target. \n 2nd Kick: Dealing magic damage and knock up the target. \n 3rd Kick: Tamamo becomes invulnerable and untargetable, dealing magic damage and knockback the target. \n If the target is a Male hero, damage type is changed to pure instead and can be target on magic immune enemy." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_range" "CAST RANGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_damage" "1ST/2ND KICK DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_final_damage" "3RD KICK DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_Note1" "Tamamo will stop dashing if target is out of 1300 range." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire" "Polygamist Castration Kick (Fire)" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_Description" "Tamamo dashs towards the target enemy and kicks him or her 3 times. \n 1st Kick: Tamamo consume 1/3 of Curse Charm's stacks, dealing magic damage, ministunning and apply Fiery Heaven's stacks to the target. \n 2nd Kick: Tamamo consume 1/2 of Curse Charm's stacks, dealing magic damage, knock up and apply Fiery Heaven's stacks to the target. \n 3rd Kick: Tamamo becomes invulnerable and untargetable. Tamamo consume all of Curse Charm's stacks, dealing magic damage, knockback and apply Fiery Heaven's stacks to the target. \n If the target is a Male servant, damage type is changed to pure instead and can be target on magic immune enemy." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_range" "CAST RANGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_damage" "1ST/2ND KICK DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_final_damage" "3RD KICK DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_bonus_damage_per_stack" "BONUS DAMAGE PER STACK:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_poly_castration_fist_fire_Note1" "Tamamo will stop dashing if target is out of 1300 range." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_berserk_Note1" "Purge only upon activation. CC applied after is ignored for its duration." ///////////////// Combo /////////////////////////////// "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike" "Combo: Raging Dragon Strike" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_Description" "Combo Requirement : 25 all stats\nCombo Sequence : W - D -> E -> E -> E in 5 seconds\n Li Shuwen chains together 3 devastating moves.\n1st Strike: Dashes to target, dealing magic damage and slowing all enemies along the path.\n2nd Strike: Stomps the ground, dealing physical damage and stunning all enemies for a short duration. \n3rd Strike: Li Shuwen knocks up all nearby enemies to the air and striking them, dealing composite damage.\n If Li Shuwen fails to activate the 3rd Strike, the cooldown of this ability is reduced. \n Li Shuwen becomes invulnerable and untargetable while using 3rd Strike." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_Lore" "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_Note0" "If there's only one target, that unit will be hit by all %third_strike_aerial_hit_count% hits." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_Note1" "Composite damage deals one third of total damage in each type." D -> E -> E -> E in 5 seconds\n Li Shuwen chains together 3 devastating moves.\n1st: Dashes to target, striking all enemies in his path %first_strike_damage% magic damage and slowing them by %first_strike_slow%% for %first_strike_slow_duration% seconds.\n2nd: Stomps the ground, dealing %second_strike_damage% physical damage to enemies within %second_strike_radius% area and stunning them for %second_strike_stun_duration% seconds. \n3rd: Li Shuwen knocks up all nearby enemies to the air for %third_strike_knockup_duration% seconds and striking them up to %third_strike_aerial_hit_count% times, divided evenly, dealing damage %third_strike_aerial_damage% plus %third_strike_bonus_damage%%% of Li Shuwen's attack damage as composite damage.\nIf Li Shuwen fails to activate the 3rd strike, the cooldown of this ability is reduced to %third_strike_failure_cdr%%%." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_delay" "CAST DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_range" "FLAG RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_flag_health" "FLAG HEALTH:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_Note0" "Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_Note1" "Winding up for new Luminosite Eternelle removes crowd control effects from last instance." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint" "Luminosite Eternelle (Saint)" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_Description" "Jeanne throws her flag in target direction, rooting and disarm all enemies along its path. \n The flag is then planted in the ground, creating a sacred zone that applied Luminosite Eternelle Flag to all allies until they leaves the zone while rooting, disarm the enemies for a short duration. \nLuminosite Eternelle Flag: Consume 1 health of Flag, reduce target's damage taken once time. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Divine Symbol and Revelation. \n Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_delay" "CAST DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_range" "FLAG RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_flag_health" "FLAG HEALTH:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_cc_duration" "ROOT/DISARM DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_Note0" "Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_delay" "CAST DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_range" "FLAG RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_flag_health" "FLAG HEALTH:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_Note0" "Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_Note1" "Winding up for new Luminosite Eternelle removes crowd control effects from last instance." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_1_Note2" "Manually casting Charisma can stack with the Charisma buff from Luminosite Eternelle." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1" "Luminosite Eternelle (Saint)" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_Description" "Jeanne throws her flag in target direction, rooting and disarm all enemies along its path. \n The flag is then planted in the ground, creating a sacred zone that applied Luminosite Eternelle Flag and Charisma to all allies until they leaves the zone while rooting, disarm the enemies for a short duration. \nLuminosite Eternelle Flag: Consume 1 health of Flag, reduce target's damage taken once time. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Revelation. \n Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_delay" "CAST DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_range" "FLAG RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_flag_health" "FLAG HEALTH:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_cc_duration" "ROOT/DISARM DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_Note0" "Only one instance of Luminousite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_1_Note2" "Manually casting Charisma can stack with the Charisma buff from Luminosite Eternelle." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2" "Luminosite Eternelle " "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_Description" "Jeanne throws her flag in target direction. \n The flag is then planted in the ground, creating a sacred zone that applied Luminosite Eternelle Flag to all allies until they leaves the zone while applied Revelation to all enemies. \nLuminosite Eternelle Flag: Consume 1 health of Flag, reduce target's damage taken once time. \nRevelation: Jeanne gains vision over target. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Divine Symbol. \n Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_delay" "CAST DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_range" "FLAG RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_reveal_duration" "VISION DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_flag_health" "FLAG HEALTH:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_upgrade_2_Note0" "Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_2" "Luminosite Eternelle (Saint)" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_luminosite_eternelle_saint_upgrade_2_Description" "Jeanne throws her flag in target direction, rooting and disarm all enemies along its path. \n The flag is then planted in the ground, creating a sacred zone that applied Luminosite Eternelle Flag to all allies until they leaves the zone while rooting, disarm and Revelation the enemies for a short duration. \nLuminosite Eternelle Flag: Consume 1 health of Flag, reduce target's damage taken once time. \nRevelation: Jeanne gains vision over target. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Divine Symbol. \n Only one instance of Luminosite Eternelle can exist at a time." While in spirit form, divine flame spreads from her to set nearby enemies ablaze, dealing magic damage based on enemy's current health.\n\nWhen Jeanne faces eventual death, she counts as alive at the round timeout when comparing the number of survivors between two teams. La Pucelle does not activate if Ruler is executed or is the last standing hero." The Debuff will be removed when enemy go out of max radius or turn in to invisible. \n Assassin class servant that is currently invisible can not be revealed. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Hunter's Mark." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_calydonian_hunt_Note0" "If distance between enemy and Atalanta is more than %sight_limit%, enemy won't be seen by Atalanta." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot" "Cobweb Shot" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_Description" "Arrows Used: 1\nArcher shoots special arrow that can't traverse impassable terrain, but instead bounces off it, creating spider web threads between bounce-impact points.\nEnemies that try to cross them are locked and rooted and then slowed while taking damage if they remain in area." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_number_of_webs" "WEBS CREATED:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_dps" "DAMAGE PER SECOND:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_web_duration" "WEBS DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_max_range_of_bounce" "MAX LENGTH OF THREAD:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_web_slow" "%WEB SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_web_lock_duration" "WEB LOCK/ROOT DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_note0" "Duration of web starts counting down moment the projectile ends (by either going out of range or reaching max bounce), but each thread of web becomes active the moment impact points are created." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_note1" "Lock and Root happens only once per cast for each enemy target (first time they are caught in web)." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_note2" "Only one instance of Cobweb can be active at a time, refreshing and recasting it destroys previous projectile and all webs." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_cobweb_shot_note3" "Being caught in multiple threads at once, doesn't multiply the effect." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap" "Entangling Trap" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_Description" "Places a trap nearby. When triggered by enemy hero it attempts to bind him with other enemy heroes, if there aren't any it binds him to the trap location.\nIf one of entangled targets moves too far from the center point between targets penalty is triggered upon all targets." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_entangle_radius" "ENTANGLE RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_entangle_punish_dist" "ENTANGLE PUNISH DIST FROM CENTER:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_damage" "DAMAGE PENALTY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_stun_duration" "PENTALTY STUN:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_trigger_radius" "TRAP ACTIVATION RADIUS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_arm_delay" "ARM DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_max_targets__TT" "MAX ENTANGLE TARGETS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_atalanta_entangling_trap_note0" "Entangled targets are pulled together to the center slightly, on both activation and penalty trigger." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_cast_delay" "CHANNEL DELAY:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_range" "CAST RANGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_total_damage" "TARGET DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_splash_damage" "SPLASH DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_radius" "SPLASH AOE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_calabolg_upgrade_stun_duration" "STUN DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_kuro_projection" "Chloe's Weapon Project List" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_projection_Description" "Spellbook: Chloe project weapons that once pass her eyes or Emiya Shirou's memories. \nExcalibur: Chloe project Excalibur, releasing multiple waves of energy to enemies along the path. \nGae Bolg: Chloe project Gae Bolg to pierces the enemy, dealing damage and stunning target. If this blow would reduce the target's health below a certain threshold, target is instantly killed. \nRho Aias: Chloe projects a shield on friendly target that absorbs certain amount of damage. Target is rooted until shield is expired. \nRosa Ichthys: Chloe projects Rosa Ichthys and rushes to the target and attacking it for a large amount of magical damage, stunning the target for a short duration. \nFake Nine Lives: Chloe projects Heracles's weapon and mimics his ultimate technique, strikes all enemies in small radius 9 times, damaging and stunning them repetitively. The last strike has bigger radius, deals more damage and briefly knocks enemies back. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Improve Projection Magic." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_projection_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_kuro_projection_upgrade" "Chloe's Weapon Project List" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_kuro_projection_upgrade_Description" "Spellbook: Chloe project weapons that once pass her eyes or Emiya Shirou's memories. \nExcalibur: Chloe project Excalibur, releasing multiple waves of energy to enemies along the path. \nGae Bolg: Chloe project Gae Bolg to pierces the enemy, dealing damage and stunning target. If this blow would reduce the target's health below a certain threshold, target is instantly killed. \nRho Aias: Chloe projects a shield on friendly target that absorbs certain amount of damage. Target is rooted until shield is expired. \nRosa Ichthys: Chloe projects Rosa Ichthys and rushes to the target and attacking it for a large amount of magical damage, stunning and slowing the target for a short duration. \nFake Nine Lives: Chloe projects Heracles's weapon and mimics his ultimate technique, strikes all enemies in small radius 9 times, damaging and stunning them repetitively. The last strike has bigger radius, deals more damage and briefly knocks enemies back." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_scathach_rune_of_protection_duration" "DURATION:" ////////////////////// Combo /////////////////////// "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_scathach_combo_gate_of_sky" "Combo : Gate of Skye" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_scathach_combo_gate_of_sky_Description" "Combo Requirement : 25 all stats\nCombo Sequence : W - Q -> F in 4 seconds\n Scathach temporarily summons a massive shadow realm gate above her head. \n After the gate open, scathach gains Gate of Skye Buff while all enemies within gate's range applying with Gate of Skye Suck. \n At the end of duration, enemies that are sucked into gate area will be instantly killed while the enemies that still in gate's range take proportion damage depend on how far they are. \nGate of Skye Buff: Scathach will immune to all knock while reducing damage taken. \nGate of Skye Suck: Target will be disabled their blink abilities and item, slowed while being sucked their mana and pulled to the center location over time. \n Enemy that run out of mana will be stunned for a short duration. \n Scathach is stunned until the gate is closed." Enemies within %medium_range% range take %moderate%%% damage. Enemies within %blast_radius% range take %low%%% damage. \n The thunders can be interrupted by her death, but Mana Burst will still be released with damage based on how long did she charge it. \n Dash damage is based on Rage Rush's base damage. \n\nUpgradable with Attribute: Lightning Overload. \n Mordred is stunned and revoked from Master until she releases Mana Burst." Twists the multi-dimension, instantly teleporting hero towards targeted location.

This item cannot be used while dimensionally locked." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_blink_scroll_blink_distance" "BLINK DISTANCE:" //==================================== // C Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_c_scroll" "Rank C Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_c_scroll_Lore" "Despite being very simple to craft and use, the unmatched reliability and flexibility made it a common equipment among reknowned mages." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_c_scroll_Description" "

Use: Fireball

Hurls a small orb of fire at a target, inflicting magic damage and stunning target.\nEach round, you can only buy up to 10 C scrolls at base price.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_c_scroll_damage" "DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_c_scroll_stun_duration" "STUN DURATION:" //==================================== // B Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll" "Rank B Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_Lore" "Widely used by the children of renowned Magus families to protect themselves from possible dangers while practicing their household magecraft." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_Description" "

Use: Barrier

Creates a barrier that absorbs magic damage from most abilities.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_barrier_block" "BLOCK AMOUNT:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_duration" "DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_Note0" "Some abilities may bypass the B scroll completely." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_b_scroll_Note1" "The barrier can be removed by strong dispel, such as Gae Dearg or Rule Breaker." //==================================== // A Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll" "Rank A Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_Lore" "The effect is not unlike that of a defensive usage of the skill known as Mana Burst." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_Description" "

Use: Shield

Shrouds hero with thick protection of mana, granting massive bonus Magic Resistance for short duration. Grants half as much magic resistance if A+ scroll has been used recently.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_bonus_mr" "%Bonus Magic Resistance:" //"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_bonus_armor" "BONUS ARMOR:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_duration" "Duration:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_scroll_Note0" "Command Seal 2 and similar effects (Reset Cooldowns) will remove the penalty." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_recipe" "A+ Scroll Recipe" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_recipe_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_recipe_Description" "Combine with A scroll to form A+ scroll." //==================================== // A+ Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_recipe" "A+ Scroll Recipe" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll" "Rank A+ Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_Description" "Shrouds hero with thick protection of mana, granting bonus magic resistance, armor, as well as healing the user for a small amount of health. Grants half as much magic resistance if A scroll has been used recently.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_healing" "Heal Amount:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_bonus_mr" "%Bonus Magic Resistance:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_bonus_armor" "Bonus Armor:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_duration" "Duration:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_a_plus_scroll_Note0" "Command Seal 2 and similar effects (Reset Cooldowns) will remove the penalty." //==================================== // S Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll" "Rank S Great Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_Lore" "Costly yet powerful, this extraordinary scroll conjures an unstable dimensional rim, preventing victim from fleeing to another dimension." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_Description" "

Use: Lightning strike

Unleashes a powerful bolt of lightning at target. The target is dispelled, dealt magic damage, and also slowed and dimensionally locked for a duration.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_damage" "DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_slow_initial" "%INITIAL SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_slow_duration" "SLOW DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_lock_duration" "LOCK DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_Note0" "S scroll is considered soft dispel, and cannot remove shield effects." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_s_scroll_Note1" "The slow has 3 stages; rooted for 1 second, 80%slow for 2.5 seconds, and 30% slow for 4 seconds." //==================================== // EX Scroll //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll" "Rank EX Great Magic Scroll" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_Lore" "Said to have been created using the Fifth True Theoretical Factor." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_Description" "

Use: Forked thunder strike

Unleashes a powerful forked thunderbolt at a group of targets, dealing magic damage. The primary target is also dispelled, slowed and dimensionally locked for a duration.\nItems cost 50%% more outside of base." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_damage" "DAMAGE:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_max_targets" "MAX TARGETS:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_slow_initial" "%INITIAL SLOW:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_slow_duration" "SLOW DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_lock_duration" "LOCK DURATION:" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_Note0" "EX scroll is considered soft dispel, and cannot remove shield effects." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_ex_scroll_Note1" "The slow has 3 stages; rooted for 1 second, 80%slow for 2.5 second, and 30% slow for 4 second." //==================================== // AMP //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_anti_magic" "Shard of Anti-Magic" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_anti_magic_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_anti_magic_Description" "

Use: Spell Immunity

Temporarily grants user with Rank EX Magic Resistance, removing all removable debuffs and rendering them immune to magic." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_anti_magic_duration" "Duration:" //==================================== // Full heal pot //==================================== "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_replenishment" "Shard of Replenishment" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_replenishment_Lore" "" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_shard_of_replenishment_Description" "
